title: Beer, Bacon and Balls
text:
5:00 p.m. Thursday, Nov. 5, 2015 Categories 
Events, Food | Wine, Fundraisers Join us for a pregame party, then stay to cheer on your favorite team. Beer samples, Bacon delights, Sports silent auction and games! It's the Browns vs the Bengals. Tickets are $20/each or a table of 4 for $75 and include beer, bacon delights, games and a chance to win autographed sports items and Browns tickets! Tickets can be purchased at the Cambridge Downtown Arena, 1005 Wheeling Ave or United Way office, 611 Wheeling Ave, Cambridge 740-439-2667. $20 will get you in, 3 drinks and a platter of bacon appetizers. There will be auction items to bid on, a DJ and, of course, big screen tvs with sports pregame activities! 21 and over please. Related
